law.catch_line: The Governor shall appoint a Cox Creek Citizens Oversight Committee....

section.section: The Governor shall appoint a Cox Creek Citizens Oversight Committee.
The terms of the members of the Oversight Committee shall be determined by the Governor.

text.section:
The Oversight Committee shall:
Monitor the redeposit of Anne Arundel County tributary spoil and other spoil in the Cox Creek area;
Hear and dispose of complaints lodged by individuals affected by the redeposit of Anne Arundel County tributary spoil and other spoil in the Cox Creek area; and
Appoint a member from the Committee to serve as a liaison to the Innovative Use Advisory Council.
